T06TD4060E:17b-1: by'a khy'a yukti s'u tra khanda sha tam /
T06TD4060E:17b-3: rnam par bshad pa rigs pa'i mdo sde'i dum bu brgya /
T06TD4060E:17b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T06TD4060E:17b-5: chos gang dag thog mar dge ba /
T06TD4060E:17b-15: mngon par brjod pas mngon par rjod par byed pa ni mang du thos pa dang /
T06TD4060E:17b-17: thos pa bsags pa yin te /
T06TD4060E:17b-18: de chos de lta bu mang po thos pa dang /
T06TD4060E:17b-22: mthong bas shin tu rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:17b-23: 'di ltar yang bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
T06TD4060E:17b-26: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
T06TD4060E:17b-28: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
T06TD4060E:17b-29: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:17b-30: de'i tsheng [?] lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /
T06TD4060E:17b-32: tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /
T06TD4060E:17b-33: dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /
T06TD4060E:17b-34: lha dang mir bcas pa'i tshogs las grol ba dang /
T06TD4060E:17b-37: rab tu rnam par grol ba dang /
T06TD4060E:17b-38: sems phyin ci ma log pas lan mang du gnas shing /
T06TD4060E:17b-39: de'i tshe bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par shes so zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:17b-40: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ni ma dul ba rnams dul bar mdzad pa /
T06TD4060E:17b-41: ma zhi ba rnams zhi bar mdzad pa /
T06TD4060E:17b-42: dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa /
T06TD4060E:17b-43: yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad pa'o zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:17b-44: de bzhin gshegs pa ni lam mkhyen pa /
T06TD4060E:18a-3: lam yongs su 'dren pa lags so zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:18a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi chos ni legs par gsungs pa /
T06TD4060E:18a-9: 'di mthong ba la don yod pa /
T06TD4060E:18a-10: mkhas pa rnams kyi rang gis rig par bya ba'o zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:18a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba ni legs par bstan pa /
T06TD4060E:18a-13: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gro bar byed pa /
T06TD4060E:18a-14: mi mthun pa med cing 'dus pa dang ldan pa zhes bya /
T06TD4060E:18a-15: rten pa yod pa zhes bya /
T06TD4060E:18a-16: 'di ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:18a-17: dge slong dag nga'i chos ni legs par gsungs pa /
T06TD4060E:18a-21: lha dang ma'i bar dag la yang dag par shin tu bstan pa'o zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:18a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni legs par zhugs pa /
T06TD4060E:18a-26: chos rjes su mthun par spyod pa'o zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:18a-27: dge slong gang tshul khrims 'chal ba sdig pa'i chos can /
T06TD4060E:18a-31: bong bu ltar kun tu spyod pa /
T06TD4060E:18a-32: dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'che ba /
T06TD4060E:18a-33: tshangs par spyod pa can ma yin par tshangs par spyod pa can du khas 'che ba de ni /
T06TD4060E:18a-34: ji ltar rmig pa gcig la rva ni med pa dang //
T06TD4060E:18a-35: rkang pa bzhi la dung gi kha can skad po che //
T06TD4060E:18a-36: rtag tu ba lang rnams kyi nang du rab 'gro de //
T06TD4060E:18a-37: 'di la khyu mchog sgra ni 'byin par mi byed ltar //
T06TD4060E:18a-38: de bzhin 'dir ni kha cig dran nyer ma bzhag cing //
T06TD4060E:18a-39: rtag tu bde bar gshegs pa mchog gi bstan pa la //
T06TD4060E:18a-40: gnas par mi byed le lo ldan zhing ma gus pa //
T06TD4060E:18a-41: 'dus ma byas pa'i go 'phang de la 'dir mi reg / gzhan yang bong bu de ni ba lang nang song yang //
T06TD4060E:18b-0: de ni ba lang rnams las @18b ring par gyur pa yin //
T06TD4060E:18b-1: gzhan yang de lta bu ni dge 'dun nang 'dug kyang //
T06TD4060E:18b-2: 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams dang ni ring ba yin zhes brjod //
T06TD4060E:18b-4: goo ta ma dag khyed ni skye dgu nyon mongs pa can /
T06TD4060E:18b-8: khyed cag la rnyed pa dag ni ci ngag yod //
T06TD4060E:18b-9: legs par rnyed pa dag ni ci dag yod //
T06TD4060E:18b-11: dge slong dag dge spyong ngam bram ze gang la la mig gis ro myong bar byed pa de dag ni dge spyong ngam bram ze'am bdud nga la sdig 'dod kyi dbang /
T06TD4060E:18b-12: du shas kyis song ba dang /
T06TD4060E:18b-15: bdud nga la sdig 'dod kyi ci 'dod dgur bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:18b-16: bdud kyi bcing ba dag gis bcings pa dang /
T06TD4060E:18b-17: bdud kyi zhags pa dag las yongs su ma grol ba zhes bya'o zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:18b-18: mi dge ba'i chos rnams yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus mthong ba'i chos nyid la sdug bsngal ba dang /
T06TD4060E:18b-19: sdug bsngal dang bcas pa dang /
T06TD4060E:18b-20: phongs pa dang bcas pa dang /
T06TD4060E:18b-21: gnod pa dang bcas pa dang /
T06TD4060E:18b-22: yongs su gdung ba dang bcas par gnas pa dang /
T06TD4060E:18b-23: lus zhig nas ngan 'gror 'gyur bar rig par bya'o zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:18b-24: srog gcod pa kun tu bstan cing bsgoms la lan mang du byas pas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:18b-25: sgrib pa lnga po sems nye bar nyon mongs par byed pa dag ni 'dod pa la 'dun pa'i sgrib pa dang /
T06TD4060E:18b-31: the tsom gyi sgrib pa'o zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:18b-32: sgyu rtsal shes dag gsum po 'di dag ni sems can rnams kyi las kyi gzhi dang /
T06TD4060E:18b-33: kun tu 'byung ba dag yin par rig par bya ste /
T06TD4060E:18b-34: sgyu rtsal shes dag gsum po gang zhe na /
T06TD4060E:18b-35: chags pa ni sems can rnams kyi las kyi gzhi dang /
T06TD4060E:18b-36: kun 'byung ba dag yin par rig par bya ste /
T06TD4060E:18b-37: sgyu rtsal shes dag zhe sdang dang //
T06TD4060E:18b-38: gti mug ni sems can rnams kyi las kyi gzhi dang /
T06TD4060E:19a-0: @19a * // kun 'byung ba dag yin par rig par bya ste zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:19a-1: de ltar rnam bar rtog pa de dag ni mi dge ba rnams dang /
T06TD4060E:19a-3: 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams dang /
T06TD4060E:19a-4: don med pa dang ldan ba rnams so zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:19a-5: mi dag gi 'dod pa rnams ni mi gtsang ba rnams dang /
T06TD4060E:19a-6: dri mi zhim pa rnams dang /
T06TD4060E:19a-8: mi mthun pa rnams yin no zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:19a-9: zas rnams dang ni skom rnams dang yang de bzhin ro rnams dang //
T06TD4060E:19a-10: bud med rnams ni 'dod rnams yin zhes 'di na kha cig 'chi //
T06TD4060E:19a-11: phung po 'di dag dri ma lags par yang dag rab mthong ste //
T06TD4060E:19a-12: de slad bdag ni sbyin dang sbyin sreg la ni dga' ma mchis //
T06TD4060E:19a-16: 'dod pa'i dbang du byas pa dang /
T06TD4060E:19a-17: 'dod pa rnams kho na'i rgyus ma dang bu dang nas rtsod par byed na zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:19a-24: lhag par zhen pa'o zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:19a-29: kun tu 'dod chags kyi rgyus khyim pa rnams dang khyim pa rnams su rtsod par byed do //
T06TD4060E:19a-34: kun tu 'dod chags kyi rgyus rab tu byung ba rnams dang /
T06TD4060E:19a-35: rab tu byung ba rnams su rtsod par byed do zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:19a-36: dge slong dag sems can de dag la ni don spyod pa med /
T06TD4060E:19a-40: dge legs spyod pa med ces bya ba dang //
T06TD4060E:19a-41: dge slong dag de ni chu gter chen po dang /
T06TD4060E:19a-42: chu'i chu bo chen po dang /
T06TD4060E:19a-44: chu'i chu chen po ma yin gyi zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:19a-46: gru bu 'dzings pa lta bu dang /
T06TD4060E:19a-48: bal ba dza lta bur 'ong ba dang 'gro bar gyur cing /
T06TD4060E:19b-0: 'jig rten @19b 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol dang /
T06TD4060E:19b-1: 'jig rten pha rol nas 'jig rten 'dir kun tu rgyug bar byed /
T06TD4060E:19b-3: 'khor ba las mi 'da' bar byed pa zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:19b-4: sdug bsngal ba mi bzad ba rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba srog 'phrog pa dag gis zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:19b-5: ci khyod la tshor ba sdug bsngal ba mi bzad pa rtsub ba tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba srog 'phrog pa skyes pa lus las bral zhing mi skye la /
T06TD4060E:19b-6: de bral zhing mi skye bar mngon pa yin nam zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:19b-8: sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid dang /
T06TD4060E:19b-9: 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid dang /
T06TD4060E:19b-10: 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid do zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:19b-12: 'du byed sdug bsngal nyid dang ni //
T06TD4060E:19b-13: 'gyur ba nyid du mkhyen nas ni //
T06TD4060E:19b-14: rdzogs sangs rab tu mkhyen pa yis //
T06TD4060E:19b-15: tshor ba sdug bsngal nyid du gsungs //
T06TD4060E:19b-16: zhes gsungs pa lta bu dang /
T06TD4060E:19b-19: lag pa khrag dmar ba dang /
T06TD4060E:19b-21: rab tu gsod pa la gnas pa dang /
T06TD4060E:19b-22: sems can srog chags su gyur pa la ngo tsha med cing snying mi brtse ba la zhugs pa yin la /
T06TD4060E:19b-23: tha na srog chags srin bu phre'u dang //
T06TD4060E:19b-24: grog sbur yan chad kyi srog gcod pa mi spang ba yin no zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:19b-25: dge slong dag gson pa rnams las gnyid log pa ni stong pa dang /
T06TD4060E:19b-29: phan yon med pa yin no zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:19b-30: byis pa rmongs pa mi gsal ba mi mkhas pa zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:19b-31: byis pa'i rang bzhin can rmongs pa'i rang bzhin can /
T06TD4060E:19b-32: shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:19b-33: gro bzhin skyes dge sbyong ngam bram ze gang la la dag gzugs mi rtag pa mi brtan pa yid brtan du mi rung ba /
T06TD4060E:19b-34: 'gyur ba'i chos can gyis che ba yin no snyam du rlom par byed /
T06TD4060E:19b-35: khyad par du 'phags so snyam du rlom par byed /
T06TD4060E:19b-36: dman pa ma yin no snyam du rlom par byed /
T06TD4060E:19b-37: gro bzhin skyes dge sbyong ngam bram ze de dag thams cad ni de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T06TD4060E:20a-0: @20a * // gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin no zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:20a-5: yang dag par de bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ba'i gzugs de lta bu 'ga' yod dam zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:20a-6: 'phags pa nyan thos shes nas dad pa bzhi dag dang ldan pa ni 'tsho ba dag gis dbul ba ma yin /
T06TD4060E:20a-8: phongs pa ma yin par 'tsho zhing zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:20a-9: gal te ting nge 'dzin 'du byed pas zin cing chu bzhin du bzung ba yin la /
T06TD4060E:20a-10: chos nyid kyis zin cing zhi ba ma yin pa dang /
T06TD4060E:20a-11: gya nom pa ma yin pa dang /
T06TD4060E:20a-12: lam shin tu sbyangs pa thob pa ma yin pa dang /
T06TD4060E:20a-13: sems rgyud gcig tu gyur pa rtogs pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:20a-14: de de ltar sems mnyam par gzhag pa yongs su dag pa dang /
T06TD4060E:20a-16: nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
T06TD4060E:20a-17: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang /
T06TD4060E:20a-21: mi g-yo ba thob na zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:20a-22: ting nge 'dzin dang gnas dang ldang //
T06TD4060E:20a-23: nyams bde ba dang spyod yul dang /
T06TD4060E:20a-24: mngon par bsgrub dang sprod pa dang //
T06TD4060E:20a-25: mi sprod de bzhin gnyis ka dang //
T06TD4060E:20a-26: skye dang 'bri dang de bzhin thabs //
T06TD4060E:20a-27: zhi gnas rab 'dzin btang snyoms so //
T06TD4060E:20a-29: sred pa yang srid pa 'byung bar byed pa dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa de dang de la mngon par dga' ba de ma lus par spangs pa dang /
T06TD4060E:20a-36: nub pa gang yin pa zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:20a-39: rtog ge la zhugs pa dang /
T06TD4060E:20a-40: rang gi spobs pa dang ldan pa dang /
T06TD4060E:20a-41: so so'i skye bo dang ldan pa dang /
T06TD4060E:20a-42: dpyod pa dang 'brel pa'i sa la gnas pa yin zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:20a-43: 'chi ba ni bzang po ma yin /
T06TD4060E:20a-44: dus byas pa ni bzang po ma yin /
T06TD4060E:20b-0: tshe phyi ma ni bzang po ma @20b yin no zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:20b-1: tsher ma phyung ba rnams dang /
T06TD4060E:20b-2: tsher ma dkrugs pa rnams dang /
T06TD4060E:20b-3: tsher ma dang bral ba rnams dang /
T06TD4060E:20b-4: tsher ma med pa rnams gang yin zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:20b-5: dad pa skyes na 'gro bar byed /
T06TD4060E:20b-6: song nas chos nyan par byed do //
T06TD4060E:20b-7: des na chos de thos nas sems par byed do //
T06TD4060E:20b-9: nye bar rtog par byed la /
T06TD4060E:20b-10: bden pa de yang lus kyis mngon sum du byed cing shes rab kyis so sor 'bigs par byed do zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:20b-11: gzhi de las sbyin pa po dang /
T06TD4060E:20b-12: sbyin pa dag gi bsod nams rgyun rgyas pa dang /
T06TD4060E:20b-13: dge ba rgyun rgyas pa dang /
T06TD4060E:20b-14: bde ba 'dren pa tshad med pa yod par zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:20b-15: rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa mang po nyams su myong bar byed de /
T06TD4060E:20b-16: gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur //
T06TD4060E:20b-17: mang por gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur la /
T06TD4060E:20b-18: snang bar gyur cing mi snang bar 'gyur ba yang shes pa dang /
T06TD4060E:20b-19: mthong bas nyams su myong bar byed pa dang /
T06TD4060E:20b-20: rtsig pa la yang thad kar 'gro /
T06TD4060E:20b-22: ra ba la yang thad kar 'gro ste /
T06TD4060E:20b-24: sa la yang steng du 'byung ba dang /
T06TD4060E:20b-26: dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no //
T06TD4060E:20b-27: chu la yang mi nub pa'i rgyun gyis 'gro ste /
T06TD4060E:20b-28: dper na sa chen po la bya ba bzhin no //
T06TD4060E:20b-29: nam mkha' la yang skyil mo krung gis 'gro ste /
T06TD4060E:20b-30: dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no //
T06TD4060E:20b-31: nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba /
T06TD4060E:20b-33: 'di ltar gzi brjid che ba la yang lag pas 'dzin cing nyug par byed kun tu nyug par byed do //
T06TD4060E:20b-34: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sems can rnams la lus kyis dbang bsgyur ro zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:20b-35: 'jig tshogs 'gog pa mya ngan las 'das pa la sems 'jug par byed /
T06TD4060E:20b-38: rnam par grol bar byed ces bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:20b-39: dge slong dag 'di la mig gi dbang po bsrung ba'i phyir dang /
T06TD4060E:21a-0: dul bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir rab tu zhugs pa yin no @21a * //
T06TD4060E:21a-2: dge slong dag dbang po drug po 'di dag shin tu dul ba dang /
T06TD4060E:21a-6: shin tu bsgoms pa ni zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:21a-7: de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kho na med pa /
T06TD4060E:21a-13: shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so //
T06TD4060E:21a-14: de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /
T06TD4060E:21a-15: de bzhin du gsum pa dang /
T06TD4060E:21a-16: de bzhin du bzhi pa dang /
T06TD4060E:21a-17: bla dang 'og dang thad kar rnam pa thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kho na med pa /
T06TD4060E:21a-23: shin tu bsgoms pas mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so zhes bya ba dang ;
T06TD4060E:21a-24: brtson 'grus brtsams shing zhum pa med pa yin /
T06TD4060E:21a-25: lus shin tu sbyangs shing nyes par brtsams pa med pa yin /
T06TD4060E:21a-26: dran pa nye bar gzhag cing kun tu rmongs pa med pa yin /
T06TD4060E:21a-27: sems mnyam par gzhag cing rtse gcig pa yin zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:21a-28: dge slong dag 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes sngar ma thos pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes shing /
T06TD4060E:21a-31: blo skyes pa yin no zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:21a-32: dge slong dag 'di ni khyed la phan pa'i phyir dang /
T06TD4060E:21a-35: bde ba'i phyir zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:21a-36: shing thags btsugs pa ni zab ring ;
T06TD4060E:21a-42: mi chags pa yin no zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:21a-43: des longs spyod skyed pa dang /
T06TD4060E:21a-46: rdul med med dri ma chags chags su bsgrubs pa /
T06TD4060E:21a-47: chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyis rnyed pa zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:21b-0: yon dbul bar byed pa ni tshe phyi ma la 'gro @21b ba gong mar 'gyur ba dang /
T06TD4060E:21b-1: skal ba bzang por 'gyur ba dang /
T06TD4060E:21b-2: rnam par smin pa bde bar 'gyur ba dang /
T06TD4060E:21b-3: mtho ris 'grub par byed par 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:21b-4: dge slong ngas khyed la skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi 'gro ba bdun dang /
T06TD4060E:21b-5: len pa med par mya ngan las 'das ba bshad par bya'o //
T06TD4060E:21b-6: skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi 'gro ba bdun gang zhe na /
T06TD4060E:21b-7: dge slong dag 'di la dge slong ni 'di ltar bdag ma byung yang rung /
T06TD4060E:21b-8: bdag gi ma byung yang rung /
T06TD4060E:21b-10: bdag gi mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam du zhugs pa yin no //
T06TD4060E:21b-11: de ltar na gang yod pa dang /
T06TD4060E:21b-12: gang byung ba de spang ngo snyam du btang snyoms thob la /
T06TD4060E:21b-13: de la chags par mi byed cing /
T06TD4060E:21b-14: de'i 'og tu zhi ba'i go 'phang gong ma la shes rab kyis so sor rtog par byed do zhes bya ba dang /
T06TD4060E:21b-15: yod pa la yang yod pa nyid dang /
T06TD4060E:21b-16: med pa la yang med pa nyid dang /
T06TD4060E:21b-17: bla ma dang bcas pa la yang bla ma dang bcas pa nyid dang /
T06TD4060E:21b-18: bla na med pa la yang bla na med pa nyid du shes par 'gyur zhes bya ba dang /
